Danijel Arsenovski wrote:

> It seems that new metadata capability in Java (in tiger) could be quite 
> useful in order to replace name conventions in junit. Are there any 
> plans in that direction?

I don't know of any. I am looking for some articles from C#/NUnit folks 
discussing the neat things that attributes allow them to do that are 
more difficult to do with JUnit. Until that day, I'm certainly not 
inclined to suggest such a large, backwards incompatible change. :)
